response.original_title: BKFC Fight Night Pechanga: Kurdanov vs. Brito
response.overview: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC) made its 2025 premiere with an action-packed night of excitement at BKFC Fight Night Pechanga on Saturday at the sold-out Pechanga Resort Casino in Temecula, CA, LIVE worldwide on The BKFC App.  The fireworks-filled event serves as an appetizer for the biggest event in bare knuckle fighting history, KnuckleMania V, which takes place Jan. 25 at Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, LIVE globally on DAZN.
response.title: BKFC Fight Night Pechanga: Kurdanov vs. Brito
